trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property, field, or parameter should be populated with all matching exports by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定應該由 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> 物件在屬性、欄位或參數中填入所有相符的匯出。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute" /> class, importing the set of exports with the default contract name.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設合約名稱來匯入匯出集，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the type of the property, field, or parameter that is marked with this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 預設的合約名稱是呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>方法的屬性、 欄位或標示了這個屬性的參數類型。

trans-unit.source: The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱使用比較<xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>執行區分大小寫且非語言比較的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the exports to import, or <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
trans-unit.target: 要匯入之匯出的合約名稱，否則為使用預設合約名稱的 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute" /> class, importing the set of exports with the specified contract name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定合約名稱來匯入匯出集，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the property, field, or parameter type that is marked with this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 預設的合約名稱是呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>標示了這個屬性的屬性、 欄位或參數型別上的方法。

trans-unit.source: The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱使用比較<xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>執行區分大小寫且非語言比較的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The type to derive the contract name of the exports to import, or <see langword="null" /> to use the default contract name.
trans-unit.target: 要從中衍生匯入之匯出合約名稱的型別，否則為使用預設合約名稱的 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute" /> class, importing the set of exports with the contract name derived from the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 使用衍生自指定型別之合約名稱來匯入匯出集，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on `contractType`.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱是呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>方法`contractType`。

trans-unit.source: The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the property, field, or parameter type that is marked with this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 預設的合約名稱是呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>標示了這個屬性的屬性、 欄位或參數型別上的方法。

trans-unit.source: The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱使用比較<xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>執行區分大小寫且非語言比較的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the exports to import, or <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
trans-unit.target: 要匯入之匯出的合約名稱，否則為使用預設合約名稱的 <see langword="null" /> 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The type of the export to import.
trans-unit.target: 要滙入的匯出類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute" /> class, importing the set of exports with the specified contract name and contract type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之合約名稱和合約型別來匯入匯出集，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the decorated property or field will be recomposed when exports that provide the matching contract change.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出當匯出可提供相符的合約變更時，裝飾的屬性或欄位是否要重新撰寫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property or field allows for recomposition when exports that provide the same <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute.ContractName" /> are added or removed from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果從 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportManyAttribute.ContractName" /> 中加入或移除提供相同 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> 的匯出時允許重新撰寫屬性或欄位，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the contract name of the exports to import.
trans-unit.target: 取得要匯入之匯出的合約名稱。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the exports to import.
trans-unit.target: 要匯入之匯出的合約名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets the contract type of the export to import.
trans-unit.target: 取得要匯入之匯出的合約型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the export that this import is expecting.
trans-unit.target: 這個匯入所預期的匯出型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />, which means that the type will be obtained by looking at the type on the member that this import is attached to.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，表示將透過在附加此匯入之成員上查看型別的方式取得型別。

trans-unit.source: If the type is <see cref="T:System.Object" />, the import will match any exported type.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別為 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，則此匯入符合所有匯出的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the importer requires a specific <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" /> for the exports used to satisfy this import.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示對於用來滿足這個匯入的匯出結果，匯入工具需要特定 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 下列其中一個值：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any" />, if the importer does not require a specific <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果匯入工具不需要特定的 <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Any" /> 則為 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" /> to require that all used exports be shared by all parts in the container.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" /> 表示會要求所有使用的匯出都要讓容器的所有組件共用。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" /> to require that all used exports be non-shared in a container.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" /> 表示會要求所有使用的匯出都不在容器中共用。

trans-unit.source: In this case, each part receives their own instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，每個組件都會收到自己的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the scopes from which this import may be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定可以滿足此匯入的範圍。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the scopes from which this import may be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 指定可以符合此匯入之來源範圍的值。
